2.3.1 Whitespace characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":

        <property name='tokens' value='STRING_LITERAL, CHAR_LITERAL'/>
        <property name='allowEmpty' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
2.3.2 Special escape sequences:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":

        <property name='id' value='avoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'/>
        <property name='allowOctal' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowUnicode' value='false'/>
        <property name='severity' value='warning'/>
    </module>"
}
2.3.3 Non-ASCII characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='JavadocStyle'>
        <property name='scope' value='public'/>
        <property name='allowHtmlTags' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowStarAfterSlash' value='false'/>
        <property name='checkEmptyJavadoc' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, ENUM_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, METHOD_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF'/>
    </module>
    <module name='JavadocParagraph'>
        <property name='scope' value='protected'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF, PARAMETER_DEF, TYPE_PARAMETER'/>
    </module>"
}
3.1 License or copyright information, if:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='RegexpSinglelineJava'>
        <property name='format' value='^\/\*.*\*\/$'/>
        <property name='message' value='License or copyright information is missing or improperly formatted.'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='false'/>
        <property name='ignoreStringLiterals' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
3.3.2 No line-wrapping:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='CustomImportOrder'>
        <property name='severity' value='warning'/>
        <property name='customImportOrderRules' value='SPECIAL_IMPORTS,STANDARD_JAVA_PACKAGE,JAVAX_PACKAGE,COM_PACKAGE'/>
        <property name='specialImportsRegExp' value='^org\\..*'/><!-- Non standard imports go here -->
        <property name='sortImportsInGroupAlphabetically' value='true'/>
        <property name='sortImportsInGroupAndKeepNonEmptyGroup' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
3.3.3 Ordering and spacing:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='ImportOrder'>
        <property name='option' value='custom'/>
        <property name='customImportOrderRules' value='STATIC,STANDARD'/>
        <property name='standardImportOrder' value='java,javax,org,com'/>
        <property name='separated' value='true'/>
        <property name='groups' value='1,2'/>
        <property name='option1' value='static'/>
        <property name='option2' value='nl'/>
        <property name='option3' value='same'/>
    </module>"
}
4 Formatting:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='4'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='arrayInitIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='4'/>
        <property name='arrayInitWrap' value='true'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='0'/>
    </module>"
}

{
    "Answer": "Yes",

        <property name='id' value='needBraces'/>

    </module>"
}

        <property name='allowEmptyTypes' value='false'/>

    </module>"
}

    </module>"
}

{

        <property name='basicOffset' value='2'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='2'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='2'/>

        <property name='methodDecl' value='2'/>
        <property name='arrayInit' value='2'/>
        <property name='type' value='2'/>
        <property name='lineWrapping' value='2'/>
        <property name='extends' value='2'/>
        <property name='implements' value='2'/>
        <property name='parameter' value='2'/>
        <property name='throws' value='2'/>
        <property name='catch' value='2'/>
        <property name='lambda' value='2'/>
        <property name='methodRef' value='2'/>
        <property name='typeCast' value='2'/>

}
4.4 Column limit: 100:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='LineLength'>
        <property name='severity' value='warning'/>
        <property name='max' value='100'/>
        <property name='ignorePattern' value='^package\s|^import\s|^[\t ]*\/\/\s*[^\n]{1,100}$'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5 Line-wrapping:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='LineLength'>
        <property name='max' value='120'/>
        <property name='ignorePattern' value='^import\\s.*;$'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodParamPad'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
        <property name='option' value='space'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='METHOD_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.1 Where to break:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='OperatorWrap'>
        <property name='option' value='NL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='EQUAL, COLON'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapNL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='DOT, METHOD_REF, TYPE_EXTENSION_AND_SUPER, LOR'/>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapEOL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='COMMA, LPAREN'/>
        <property name='option' value='EOL'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodParamPad'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
        <property name='option' value='space'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CTOR_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.1 Vertical Whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='EmptyLineSeparator'>
        <property name='allowMultipleEmptyLines' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.2 Horizontal whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    <module name="OperatorWrap">
        <property name="option" value="NL"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="COLON, QUESTION, LAMBDA"/>
    </module>
    <module name="SeparatorWrap">
        <property name="id" value="SeparatorWrapEOL"/>
        <property name="tokens" value="RPAREN, COMMA"/>
        <property name="option" value="EOL"/>
    </module>
    <module name="WhitespaceAround">
        <property name="tokens" value="ASSIGN"/>
    </module>
    <module name="WhitespaceAfter">
        <property name="tokens" value="LPAREN"/>
    </module>
    <module name="WhitespaceBefore">
        <property name="tokens" value="RPAREN"/>
    </module>
}
4.6.3 Horizontal alignment: never requir:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='LeftCurly'>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, LITERAL_CASE, LITERAL_DEFAULT'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RightCurly'>
        <property name='option' value='alone'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, LITERAL_CASE, LITERAL_DEFAULT'/>
    </module>"
}

}

        <property name='format' value='at'/>

}

5.1 Rules common to all identifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='Regexp'>
        <property name='format' value='\\w+'/>
        <property name='message' value='Identifiers should use only ASCII letters and digits, and underscores'/>
        <property name='illegalPattern' value='[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z0-9_]*'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
        <property name='ignoreCase' value='false'/>
        <property name='ignoreStringLiterals' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.1 Package names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='PackageName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-z0-9]*(\.[a-z0-9]+)*$'/>
        <property name='illegalFormat' value='_'/>
        <property name='message' value='Package name does not match the required naming convention.'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.2 Class names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='RegexpSingleline'>
        <property name='format' value='^[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='message' value='Class names should be in UpperCamelCase'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
        <property name='ignoreCase' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.3 Method names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='MethodName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='allowUnderscore' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='METHOD_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.4 Constant names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='ConstantName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[A-Z][A-Z0-9]*(_[A-Z0-9]+)*$'/>
        <property name='ignoreScope' value='false'/>
        <property name='ignoreNameCase' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowHungarianNotation' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowDigits' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowUnderscore' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}

{

}

{
    "Answer": "Yes",

        <property name='format' value='^[A-Z][a-zA-Z]*T$'/>

}
5.3 Camel case: defined:
Here's an example of how you might configure CheckStyle for the given style convention:

```xml
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
        <property name="id" value="regexp_id_1"/>
        <property name="format" value="^(XmlHttp[A-Z])$"/>
        <property name="message" value="Variable name does not follow camel case convention"/>
        <property name="ignoreFormat" value="true"/>
    </module>
    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
        <property name="id" value="regexp_id_2"/>
        <property name="format" value="^(new[a-z])$"/>
        <property name="message" value="Variable name does not follow camel case convention"/>
        <property name="ignoreFormat" value="true"/>
    </module>
    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
        <property name="id" value="regexp_id_3"/>
        <property name="format" value="^(inner[a-z])$"/>
        <property name="message" value="Variable name does not follow camel case convention"/>
        <property name="ignoreFormat" value="true"/>
    </module>
    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
        <property name="id" value="regexp_id_4"/>
        <property name="format" value="^(supports[a-z])$"/>
        <property name="message" value="Variable name does not follow camel case convention"/>
        <property name="ignoreFormat" value="true"/>
    </module>
    <module name="RegexpSingleline">
        <property name="id" value="regexp_id_5"/>
        <property name="format" value="^(YouTube[A-Z])$"/>
        <property name="message" value="Variable name does not follow camel case convention"/>
        <property name="ignoreFormat" value="true"/>
    </module>
}
```

This configuration uses the `RegexpSingleline` module in CheckStyle to enforce the camel case convention for variable names. Adjust the regular expressions and messages as needed for your specific requirements.
